Sentencas: This work investigates the dynamic operation of a large solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system using the system identification modeling approach.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: Transient modeling can be of particular interest in order to describe and optimize start-up and shut-down procedures in SOFC systems; moreover, mathematical description of transients is helpful in the diagnostic of hazardous conditions during dynamic operation (i.e., load following).
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: Physical based models-described by differential equations-are usually complex and need significant computing time.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: To achieve real-time capability, the focus is on empirical models.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: In this study, the transient operation of a large SOFC generator is reproduced by using the system identification approach that is based on the definition of a black-box model and on the identification of main model coefficients based on real experimental data.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: In particular, the start-up of the system and its dynamics under fuel sensitivity experiments are investigated.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: First, the work valuably shows some experimental results of a large SOFC generator under dynamic operation.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: In particular, modeling results show that the system identification approach is an effective tool for the description of the transient behavior of SOFC large systems.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: The simulation of the start-up of a 100 kWe (electric) SOFC system shows the possibility to save similar to 20% of start-up time using an electric air heater rated a 30% in power than the nominal one.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: The increase of natural gas flow during the start-up operation is instead not beneficial in term of yielding a faster procedure; rather, it leads to an excessive cooling of the stack due to internal reforming of natural gas (the higher amount of fuel burnt in the combustion zone does not lead to a more efficient way to preheat the cathode air).
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems

Sentencas: The results of this work are fully supported by experimental data available from a real generator running in Italy through years 2006-2009 and thus believed to be a valuable contribution for the scientific and engineering community.
Titulo: Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems
Experimental Modeling of Transients in Large SOFC Systems
